remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會修剪過多的斜線字元，以建立格式正確的路徑。This method trims excess slash-mark characters to create a properly formatted path. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CombinePath`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CombinePath` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |結合的目錄路徑和檔案名稱Combine a directory path and file name|[如何：剖析檔案路徑How to: Parse File Paths](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-parse-file-paths.md)| ## Examples 此範例會結合目錄路徑和檔案名稱，以建立格式正確的路徑。This example combines a directory path and file name to create a properly formatted path. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#3)] 此範例會結合兩個路徑，建立格式正確的路徑。This example combines two paths to create a properly formatted path. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 這個範例會傳回`C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`。This example returns `C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`.

summary.span: 將目錄複製至其他目錄。

span.span: Copies a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製目錄內容以及目錄本身。This method copies the contents of the directory as well as the directory itself. 如果目標目錄不存在，它會建立它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果具有相同名稱的目錄存在於目標位置，則會合併兩個目錄的內容。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 您可以在作業期間指定目錄的新名稱。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 目錄內的檔案複製時，可能會擲回例外狀況所造成的由特定的檔案。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 當這類例外狀況會擲回時，它們會合併成單一的例外狀況的`Data`屬性的形式保留項目其中的檔案或目錄路徑是索引鍵，而特定的例外狀況訊息會包含在對應的值。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用`For…Each`列舉所有項目。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |複製目錄Copy a directory|[如何：將目錄複製到另一個目錄How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下列範例會複製目錄`TestDirectory1`成`TestDirectory2`，覆寫現有檔案。The following example copies the directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 取代`C:\TestDirectory1`和`C:\TestDirectory2`的路徑和名稱，您想要複製的目錄以及您要將它複製的位置。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

summary.span: 將目錄複製至其他目錄。

span.span: Copies a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製目錄內容以及目錄本身。This method copies the contents of the directory as well as the directory itself. 如果目標目錄不存在，它會建立它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果具有相同名稱的目錄存在於目標位置，則會合併兩個目錄的內容。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 您可以在作業期間指定目錄的新名稱。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 目錄內的檔案複製時，可能會擲回例外狀況所造成的由特定的檔案。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 當這類例外狀況會擲回時，它們會合併成單一的例外狀況的`Data`屬性的形式保留項目其中的檔案或目錄路徑是索引鍵，而特定的例外狀況訊息會包含在對應的值。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用`For…Each`列舉所有項目。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |複製目錄Copy a directory|[如何：將目錄複製到另一個目錄How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下列範例會複製目錄`TestDirectory1`成`TestDirectory2`，覆寫現有檔案。The following example copies the directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 取代`C:\TestDirectory1`和`C:\TestDirectory2`的路徑和名稱，您想要複製的目錄以及您要將它複製的位置。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CopyFile` 不會保留 Ace （存取控制項目）。`CopyFile` does not preserve ACEs (Access Control Entries). 新建立的檔案會將預設的 Ace 繼承建立所在的目錄。The newly created file inherits default ACEs from the directory in which it is created. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |將檔案複製到相同的目錄。Copy a file to the same directory.|[如何：在相同目錄內建立檔案複本How to: Create a Copy of a File in the Same Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-the-same-directory.md)| |將檔案複製到不同的目錄。Copy a file to a different directory.|[如何：於不同目錄內建立檔案複本How to: Create a Copy of a File in a Different Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-a-different-directory.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將檔案複製`Test.txt`目錄`TestFiles2`而不覆寫現有的檔案。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` without overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 檔案路徑取代為您要在程式碼中使用的路徑。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code. 此範例會將檔案複製`Test.txt`目錄`TestFiles2`並將它重新命名`NewFile.txt`。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` and renames it `NewFile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#16)] 檔案路徑取代為您要在程式碼中使用的路徑。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code.

[!code-vb[VbRefFile#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 檔案路徑取代為您要在程式碼中使用的路徑。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code. 此範例會將檔案複製`Test.txt`目錄`TestFiles2`並將它重新命名`NewFile.txt`。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` and renames it `NewFile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#16)] 檔案路徑取代為您要在程式碼中使用的路徑。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此範例會刪除目錄`OldDirectory`才是空的。The example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` only if it is empty. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#58](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#58)] 此範例會刪除目錄`OldDirectory`和其所有內容，傳送至**資源回收筒**，但不會顯示作業的進度。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents, sending them to the **Recycle Bin**, but does not show the progress of the operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 `wildcards` 參數指定特定模式。You can use the `wildcards` parameter to specify a specific pattern. 如果您想要在搜尋中包括子目錄的內容，請將 `searchType` 參數設定為 `SearchAllSubDirectories`。If you would like to include the contents of subdirectories in the search, set the `searchType` parameter to `SearchAllSubDirectories`. 如果找不到符合指定模式的目錄，則會傳回空集合。An empty collection is returned if no directories matching the specified pattern are found. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.GetDirectories`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.GetDirectories` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |清單中具有特定模式的子目錄List subdirectories with a specific pattern|[如何：尋找具有特定模式的子目錄How to: Find Subdirectories with a Specific Pattern](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-find-subdirectories-with-a-specific-pattern.md)| ## Examples 下列範例會傳回所有目錄中包含文字的目錄結構`Logs`名稱中將它們新增至`ListBox1`。The following example returns all the directories in the directory structure that contain the word `Logs` in their names and adds them to `ListBox1`. span.span: Moves a file to a new location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目標結構不存在，它會建立它。If the target structure does not exist, it is created. `MoveFile`方法會保留 Ace （存取控制項目） 只能在移動相同的磁碟區中的檔案時。The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume. 這包括繼承的 Ace，而變得直接的 Ace，當移動 （直接 Ace 優先於繼承 Ace）。This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs). 如果磁碟區之間移動檔案，將不會複製 Ace。If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |移動檔案Move a file|[如何：移動檔案How to: Move a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-move-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將檔案移`Test.txt`從`TestDir1`至`TestDir2`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#86)] 此範例會將檔案移`Test.txt`從`TestDir1`要`TestDir2`並將它重新命名`Test2.txt`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2` and renames it `Test2.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#87)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目標結構不存在，它會建立它。If the target structure does not exist, it is created. `MoveFile`方法會保留 Ace （存取控制項目） 只能在移動相同的磁碟區中的檔案時。The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume. 這包括繼承的 Ace，而變得直接的 Ace，當移動 （直接 Ace 優先於繼承 Ace）。This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs). 如果磁碟區之間移動檔案，將不會複製 Ace。If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |移動檔案Move a file|[如何：移動檔案How to: Move a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-move-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將檔案移`Test.txt`從`TestDir1`至`TestDir2`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#86)] 此範例會將檔案移`Test.txt`從`TestDir1`要`TestDir2`並將它重新命名`Test2.txt`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2` and renames it `Test2.txt`. remarks.format: ## Remarks `OpenTextFileWriter`方法會開啟並初始化檔案資料流，然後傳回該資料流的物件。The `OpenTextFileWriter` method opens and initializes a stream for a file and then returns the object for that stream. 您可以視需要多次的資料流寫入，然後再將之關閉當您完成時。You can write to the steam as many times as necessary and then close it when you are finished. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫方法物件，並確定所有資料都會正確地都寫入至基礎資料流。You must call the method on the object to make sure that all data is correctly written to the underlying stream. 如果您要寫入檔案中只有少數的字串，則可能使用的工作變得更容易方法。If you are writing only a few strings to a file, it might be simpler to use the method. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |將文字寫入至檔案 `StreamWriter`Write text to a file with a `StreamWriter`|[如何：以 StreamWriter 將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)| ## Examples 此範例會開啟具有`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法並使用它來將字串寫入文字檔`WriteLine`方法`StreamWriter`類別。This example opens a with the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method and uses it to write a string to a text file with the `WriteLine` method of the `StreamWriter` class. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OpenTextFileWriter`方法會開啟並初始化檔案資料流，然後傳回該資料流的物件。The `OpenTextFileWriter` method opens and initializes a stream for a file and then returns the object for that stream. 您可以視需要多次的資料流寫入，然後再將之關閉當您完成時。You can write to the steam as many times as necessary and then close it when you are finished. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫方法物件，並確定所有資料都會正確地都寫入至基礎資料流。You must call the method on the object to make sure that all data is correctly written to the underlying stream. 如果您要寫入檔案中只有少數的字串，則可能使用的工作變得更容易方法。If you are writing only a few strings to a file, it might be simpler to use the method. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |將文字寫入至檔案 `StreamWriter`Write text to a file with a `StreamWriter`|[如何：以 StreamWriter 將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)| ## Examples 此範例會開啟具有`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法並使用它來將字串寫入文字檔`WriteLine`方法`StreamWriter`類別。This example opens a with the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method and uses it to write a string to a text file with the `WriteLine` method of the `StreamWriter` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAllBytes`方法的`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件可讓您讀取二進位檔案。The `ReadAllBytes` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a binary file. 檔案的內容會傳回為位元組陣列。The contents of the file are returned as a byte array. 請勿根據檔案名稱來判斷檔案內容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，檔案 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在應用程式中使用這些資料之前，請先驗證所有輸入值。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllBytes`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllBytes` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |讀取二進位檔案Read from a binary file|[如何：讀取二進位檔案How to: Read From Binary Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-binary-files.md)| ## Examples 此範例會從檔案讀取 `C:/Documents and Settings/selfportrait.jpg.`This example reads from the file `C:/Documents and Settings/selfportrait.jpg.` [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAllText` 物件的 `My.Computer.FileSystem` 方法允許您從文字檔讀取。The `ReadAllText` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a text file. 檔案的內容會傳回為字串。The contents of the file are returned as a string. 檔案編碼方式可以是指定檔案的內容是否在 ASCII 或 utf-8 之類的編碼。The file encoding can be specified if the contents of the file are in an encoding such as ASCII or UTF-8. 如果您從含擴充字元的檔案進行讀取，您需要指定檔案的編碼使用的另一個多載方法。If you are reading from a file with extended characters, you need to specify the file encoding using another overload of the method. 請勿根據檔案名稱來判斷檔案內容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，檔案 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在應用程式中使用這些資料之前，請先驗證所有輸入值。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從文字檔讀取Read from a text file|[如何：從文字檔讀取How to: Read from Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取的內容`Test.txt`轉換為字串，然後將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the contents of `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 這個範例會讀取 ASCII 檔案的內容`Test.txt`轉換為字串，然後將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the contents of the ASCII file `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAllText` 物件的 `My.Computer.FileSystem` 方法允許您從文字檔讀取。The `ReadAllText` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a text file. 檔案的內容會傳回為字串。The contents of the file are returned as a string. 檔案編碼方式可以是指定檔案的內容是否在 ASCII 或 utf-8 之類的編碼。The file encoding can be specified if the contents of the file are in an encoding such as ASCII or UTF-8. 如果您從含擴充字元的檔案進行讀取，您需要指定檔案的編碼方式。If you are reading from a file with extended characters, you need to specify the file encoding. 請勿根據檔案名稱來判斷檔案內容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，檔案 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在應用程式中使用這些資料之前，請先驗證所有輸入值。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從文字檔讀取Read from a text file|[如何：從文字檔讀取How to: Read from Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取的內容`Test.txt`轉換為字串，然後將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the contents of `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 這個範例會讀取 ASCII 檔案的內容`Test.txt`轉換為字串，然後將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the contents of the ASCII file `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的路徑，但不包括檔案名稱，不是有效的會擲回例外狀況。If the specified path, excluding the file name, is not valid, a exception will be thrown. 如果此路徑有效，但檔案不存在，則會建立檔案。If the path is valid but the file does not exist, the file is created. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllBytes`方法開啟的檔案、 寫入，，然後關閉它。The `WriteAllBytes` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用程式碼`WriteAllBytes`方法是使用程式碼比簡單物件。Code that uses the `WriteAllBytes` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 不過，如果您將資料加入至檔案，使用迴圈，物件可提供較佳的效能，因為您只需要開啟和關閉檔案一次。However, if you are adding data to a file using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file once. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |寫入至二進位檔案Write to a binary file|[如何：寫入二進位檔案How to: Write to Binary Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-to-binary-files.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將附加的資料陣列`CustomerData`souboru `CollectedData`。This example appends the data array `CustomerData` to the file `CollectedData`. remarks.format: ## Remarks Utf-8 編碼方式，用來寫入檔案。The UTF-8 encoding is used to write to the file. 若要指定不同的編碼方式，使用的不同多載方法。To specify a different encoding, use a different overload of the method. 如果指定的檔案不存在，則會建立該檔案。If the specified file does not exist, it is created. 如果指定的編碼方式不符合現有檔案的編碼，則會忽略指定的編碼。If the specified encoding does not match the existing encoding of the file, the specified coding is ignored. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllText`方法開啟的檔案、 寫入，，然後關閉它。The `WriteAllText` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用程式碼`WriteAllText`方法是使用程式碼比簡單物件。Code that uses the `WriteAllText` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 不過，如果使用一個迴圈中，將字串加入至檔案物件可提供較佳的效能，因為您只需要開啟和關閉檔案一次。However, if you are adding strings to a file by using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file one time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` method. |若要To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |將文字寫入檔案中Write text to a file|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)| |將文字附加至檔案Append text to a file|[如何：附加至文字檔How to: Append to Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此範例會將行寫入`"This is new text to be added."`souboru `Test.txt`，覆寫任何現有的文字檔案中。This example writes the line `"This is new text to be added."` to the file `Test.txt`, overwriting any existing text in the file. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 此範例中的檔案名稱寫入`Documents and Settings`資料夾，以`FileList.txt`，是為了方便閱讀每個之間插入換行字元傳回。This example writes the names of the files in the `Documents and Settings` folder to `FileList.txt`, inserting a carriage return between each for better readability. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#22)]
